entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: "*App*" wildcard for [UnsafeAccessor] assembly name #106216
    Future
  • ILLink keeps members of pointer/byref types for DynamicallyAccessedMembers #106214
  • System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.OpAssign.AssignmentEquivalentsWithMemberAccess causing crash #106207
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest failure - time out, unexpected exit code #106206
  • [API Proposal]: Add FromFile method to BinaryData #106203
  • [browser][jiterp] possibly wrong code for jitcall trampolines #106200
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel long-running operation base type `OperationResult` #106197
  • PosixSignalRegistration.Create hangs debugger on MacOS (Rider & VSCode) #106194
  • [browser] memory leaks #106189
    10.0.0
  • `gtTreeHasSideEffects` handles `GT_INTRINSIC` incorrectly #106187
  • ARM-SVE: AddSequentialAcross() is defined incorrectly #106180
    9.0.0
  • [mono] thread not been gc when method execute end. #106176

Closed

  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices docs for .NET 9 APIs #105986
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.LastValue looks like it could experience torn reads #91591
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed ''targetReg != embMaskOp1Reg'' during 'Generate code' #106124
    9.0.0
  • BEGIN_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH mechanism for corelib.h does not work with checked/debug runtime and a trimmed app #55950
    10.0.0
  • Race condition during TraceSource Initialization/Refresh #104457
    9.0.0
  • Invalid suppression in `TypeConverter` when loading a custom converter type #95265
    9.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when calling static virtual method in interface #82217
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(intrinsicInfo.numArgs == -1) || (sig->numArgs == static_cast<uint8_t>(intrinsicInfo.numArgs))' during 'Morph - Inlining' (IL size 568; hash 0xb #105922
    9.0.0
  • Implement real fix for C5271 in IJW test build #92879
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Tests.Perf.** and System.Perf.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89243
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Memory.Span.** and System.Memory.ReadOnly.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89247
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Text.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89242
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.IO.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89249
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Globalization.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89250
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Collections.** and System.Buffers.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89251
    9.0.0
  • MSB3026 because System.Drawing.csproj is being built multiple times #106195
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code that doesn't compile when using StringValues #94547
    9.0.0
  • [perf] Microsoft.Extensions** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89252
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] 7.0 -> 8.0-RC1 Microbenchmark Comparison #91626
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS and WASM disk size regressions on 06 Dec 2022 #79285
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] init_jit_call_info Attempting to JIT compile method - interp.c:2663 #101482
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'insOptsScalableWide(opt)' during 'Generate code' #105720
    9.0.0
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED when trying to debug .NET 8 Blazor Web project simulating iOS device on edge #104234
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82224
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Unable to use Emscripten ports not in cache #99176
    10.0.0
  • [Apple-mobile] Segfault when retrieving native sort key on apple platforms. #105932
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Logging formatting with multiple collections #106213
    area-Extensions-Logging, 9.0.0
  • Simplify MethodDesc::GetLoaderModule #106212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean up ILLink logic for "inflating" generic types #106211
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Stop creating map of assembly refs to name for `Module` #106210
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer #106209
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] make sure that MonoBundledResource.id is valid #106205
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][AOT] disable jiterp for jitcall trampolines #106202
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `GatherVectorWithByteOffsetFirstFaulting` #106199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] JitDisasmWithGC: Output any delta in GC info #106196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mention ILVerification breaking change in ILVerification package release notes #106193
    area-ILVerification
  • Small tunning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle peeling cns + cns patterns more robustly #106190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix `gtNodeHasSideEffects` checking call arguments #106185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add checks for MOVPRFX sequencing (#105514) #106184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Teach middle-end liveness to DCE dead calls without sideeffects #106183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Shuffle MethodTable flags #106182
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add dispose() to Bitmap obj #106181
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile default value #106179
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Remove two outdated test inputs from regex match timeout tests #106174
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid package dependencies on libraries in the shared framework #106172
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Switch build x64 image to Azure Linux 3.0 #106170
    needs-area-label
  • Implementation of SOSDacApi GetMethodDescName for cDAC #106169
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add `DebuggerHidden` to managed JitHelpers #106167
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Cache the path on `Module` for easier diagnostics #106103
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add new API docs for System.Runtime.InteropServices #106208
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix concurrency issue with metrics gauge value collection #106175
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Enable Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask() to take both operands as zero #106130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #105853
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Implement support for BEGIN/END_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH in CoreLib/EE interface validation #106151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix threading issue during TraceSource initialization #106192
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add script to aot HelloWorld sample app #106204
    documentation, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Mention GitHub users when the issue/PR binaryformatter-migration label is added #106171
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Make Config generator test only for down-casts #106145
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: HW intrinsics with a 'this' parameter are illegal #106173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix C5271 warning in IJW tests #106153
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix resourcemanagement.yml for os-ios, os-android etc #106198
    needs-area-label
  • Add os-ios, os-android etc labels to area section in resourceManagement.yml #106082
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Revert short branch removal #106178
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Allow browser runtime build to use custom cache path #106188
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] System.Console CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler increase timeout #106119
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete superfluous CanGetUnflushedBytes check in Serialize #106163
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Fix overriding emscripten cache #106177
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Use the right env variable in mono.proj for frozen cache #106150
    area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Handle small buffer case in sortkey #106062
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix config binding with records having collection constructor parameter #106158
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2512415 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • [System.Text.Json] Improve error handling of ref structs, including collection types with ref struct elements. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Block eventpipe delete provider for pending callbacks #106156
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Only run AVX512 tests on CPUs that support it (Windows) #106161
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip putting patches in certain stubs to prevent crashing on step-in on M1 with JMC disabled #106105
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out (#105580) #106139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Removes the outer loop for CountBy #106111
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix NativeAOT runtime build without FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #106157
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement inlined thread statics for the single-threaded mode #2649

PullRequests

Created

  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to August 6 #2647
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error NU1903: Warning As Error: Package 'System.Private.Uri' 4.3.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xhfc-gr8f-ffwc #42651
  • Daily build: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.34) #42638
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #42637

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42655
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Always print manifest versions in workload list command #42653
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Forward port: Fix .net8 template #42635
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • doco: Update wrong env var #42632
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #42630
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [main] use stage 2 MSBuild version instead of stage 0 for msbuild disjoint c… #42571
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Bump branding for 401 hotfix #42624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [Web SDK] Avoid copying packages.lock.json to the output folder #42639
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42656
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Download rsync if using mariner #42628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2512206 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Functional Interfaces #3452
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a proposal for better conversion from collection expression #8348

Merged

  • Create extensions-wg-2024-08-09.md #8350

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# compiler integration with new System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExtendedLayoutAttribute #74705
  • Decompiled sources resolve wrong type. #74704
  • Refactor "Move type to file" should re-evaluate file header template #74703
  • Fix formatting not using tabs #74702
  • Visual Studio did not auto fill complete after typing Property in VB.net #74701
  • CA1003 does not take the return value of an event handler into account #74694
  • Default literals should not contribute their type from initial binding to best-type in nullable analysis #74693

Closed

  • The [InterceptsLocation] attribute generates a different "data" string for big-endian platforms #74682
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35208.78 #74692

PullRequests

Created

  • Modify ISyntaxTreeFactoryService.CreateSyntaxTree to take in an optional SourceText. #74707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle partial properties in struct field ordering warning #74706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trying out a nightly build #74699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Issue71522 wip #74691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issues with VSCode LSP EA causing handlers to fail to load #74700
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rewrite BulidSolution in Integration tests #74690
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure that GetContentHash produces the same value on different endian machines #74696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove most usage of "new ArrayBuilder" #74689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot use Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server when using "WebApplication.Urls" #57255
  • OIDC front channel remote sign-out "iss" claim check bypassed by default #57254
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc #57250
  • Ihosted service Task hosted in IIS process is not triggering StopAsync while performing IISreset #57248
  • Perf improvement: caching #57245
  • WithHttpLogging configuration is not respected #57244

Closed

  • `[ApiController]` attributes causes exception during serialization of `(Validation)ProblemDetails` when using source-generator-based serialization #57019
  • Can't display object properties #57252
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla #57251
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #57229
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57239
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57240
  • [ARM64][JSPS]Debugging issue: Swagger Page Load Failure #57249
  • Project that uses Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web copies packages.lock.json to output #55568
    9.0-rc1
  • Static SSR sets null to an array property of a model for EditForm when submit. #56890
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor form bindings does not work when property has non latin characters #56082
    9.0-rc1
  • Antiforgery state doesn't always reach interactive components #54533
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #57226
  • Use DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute for things like Blazor NavigationExcetptions #57085
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor needs to be more object oriented and event handlers need to be revised. #57024
  • .NET 8 - '_framework/blazor.web.js' requires Authentication for some reason #56970
  • Blazor .net 8 new interactive project structure fails to connect to debug adapter #57077

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix OpenAPI transformer lifetimes and disposal #57253
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Allow cascading value subscribers to get added and removed during change notification #57243
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix antiforgery not being available after first render #57237
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56456
    area-infrastructure
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • CreateCounter can create corruptable counter #4843
    Future

PullRequests

  • [LoongArch64] Part-1:Add LoongArch64 support in src/shard directory #4835

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border updates stroke too frequently #24123
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Diagnostics.BindingDiagnostics warnings are displayed for setting binding to TextProperty for Entry control #24120
    Backlog
  • iOS push notification fails with NotificationHubClient in release mode #24118
  • Resolving Offset Errors in MAUI 8 Apps Post-Publisher Signing #24117

Closed

  • Initial value for the SearchHandler background color ignored on page first appearance #24100
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] First Entry gets focused when page appears #23911
  • ListView is not scrolling on iOS #23926
  • How to activate Hyper-v, in my windows feature it is not found #24097
  • resource mipmap/appicon_round (aka com.companyname.mauiapp:mipmap/appicon_round) not found #18904
  • [Windows] Converter not found #9484
    Backlog
  • [Memory leak] Critical MAUI memory leak in transient views #23537
  • Unable to Disable the Window preview in MAUI #23754
  • I am using this method ( .NET 8 ) but it display a white screen after splash screen #23743
  • Can't take photos on MacOS #23815
  • Error APPX1101: [UWP] Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path: Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Core.dll in MSAL Authentication #23884
  • .Net Maui Styles break in 17.10 of Visual Studio #23008
  • Can't install MAUI on Windows 11 #23864
  • The underlying connection was closed: Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel. #23799
  • xcode-select --install xcode-select: note: Command line tools are already installed. Use "Software Update" in System Settings or the softwareupdate command line interface to install updates #23907
  • cant build app #23876

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Control device tests #24128
  • Remove instances of '#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER' #24126
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure border stroke only updates when needed #24125
    area-controls-border
  • Correct "can not" to "cannot" in messages, comments, etc. #24124
    area-xaml
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24115
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove excessive StackLayout API docs #24114
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Remove excessive Grid API comment #24037
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows][GestureManager] Unsubscribe control tap events only if they were subscribed #23976
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Allow setting `PlatformCanvas.Antialias` #23965
    community ✨
  • Account for safearea #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Chore] Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark #24033
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Space character in Webview's Source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.NotImplementedException with precompiledquery tests #34393
  • Flag indicating running from migration bundle #34392

Closed

  • Problem with SqliteCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue when trying to add parameter for WHERE clause. #34391
  • Remove DISTINCT inside IN/EXISTS/set operations #31016
    9.0.0
  • Documentation is unclear for Guid primary keys #34260
  • The specified deps.json [D:\MyProject\MAUI\QA\QA.Client\bin\Debug\net8.0-maccatalyst\maccatalyst-x64\QA.Client.deps.json] does not exist #33203
  • Blazor Hybrid Entity Framework Migration: deps.Json is not created in Android folder #33789

PullRequests

Created

  • added flag indicating execution from migration bundle; #34394

Merged

  • Split UseSqlServer/UseAzureSql/UseAzureSynapse builders #34385
  • Fix some Cosmos tests on CI #34390
  • Optimize away DISTINCT inside IN/EXISTS/set operations #34381

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Find the discriminator property even if it is not string #34388
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.9
  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
